<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Malarunk](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1537)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Charau-ka" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=263" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #145: Hellknight Hill](/Sources.aspx?ID=4) pg. 58</row>

**Perception** +13; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**
[Boggard](/Languages.aspx?ID=27), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Mwangi](/Languages.aspx?ID=39)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +10, [Dragon Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +11, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +11, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +13, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +2

**Con** +2

**Int** +0

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
_+1 [chain shirt](/Armor.aspx?ID=6)_, [_Cinderclaw gauntlet_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=482), gold [religious symbol](/Equipment.aspx?ID=41) of [Dahak](/Deities.aspx?ID=150) (worth 20 gp), [Hatchet](/Weapons.aspx?ID=27), _[hunter's arrowhead](/Equipment.aspx?ID=483)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 22 

**Fort** +11 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +13 

</row>

**HP** 63

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, climb 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_Cinderclaw gauntlet_ +13 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Free-Hand](/Traits.aspx?ID=181), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 2d4+5 piercing plus 1d6 fire on a critical hit

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hatchet +12 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 1d6+5 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hatchet +12 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+5 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
thrown debris +11 ([deadly 1d6](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [range 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 2d6+5 bludgeoning

**Divine Prepared Spells** DC 23, attack +13
- **Cantrips (2nd)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Guidance](/Spells.aspx?ID=142), [Prestidigitation](/Spells.aspx?ID=229), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280)
- **1st**
[Create Water](/Spells.aspx?ID=53), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Sanctuary](/Spells.aspx?ID=266)
- **2nd**
[Create Food](/Spells.aspx?ID=52), [Sound Burst](/Spells.aspx?ID=292), [Spiritual Weapon](/Spells.aspx?ID=306)
- **3rd**
[Dream Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=90), [Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119), [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) (×3; deals d10s for damage instead of d8s)

**[Channel Smite](/Feats.aspx?ID=276)** <actions string="Two Actions" />  **Cost** Expend a [_harm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) spell; **Effect** You siphon the destructive energies of positive or negative energy through a melee attack and into your foe. Make a melee Strike and add the spell's damage to the Strike's damage. This is negative damage if you expended a _harm_ spell or positive damage if you expended a _heal_ spell. The spell is expended with no effect if your Strike fails or hits a creature that isn't damaged by that energy type (such as if you hit a non-[undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) creature with a _heal_ spell).

**Shrieking Frenzy** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) **Trigger** The charau-ka's turn begins. **Frequency** Once per hour; **Effect** The charau-ka is [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32) until the end of its turn, and can use the extra action to Stride or Strike. Due to its loud wailing while in a shrieking frenzy, the charau-ka can't speak and automatically critically fails all [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) checks.

**Thrown Weapon Mastery**   When a charau-ka throws a weapon, the weapon gains the [deadly d6](/Traits.aspx?ID=174) weapon trait. When it throws an improvised weapon, it doesn't take the –2 penalty for using an improvised weapon, nor does it take the penalty for using that weapon to make a lethal attack instead of a nonlethal attack.

</column>
